akn:content.akn:p:
§ 20162. Definition of upper atmosphere In this subchapter, the term “upper atmosphere” means that portion of the Earth’s sensible atmosphere above the troposphere. (Pub. L. 111–314, § 3, Dec. 18, 2010, 124 Stat. 3354.)
